product.longDescription: Yellowstone's 6–8" long roots are deeper in color than most other yellow carrot varieties. Nice, vigorous tops will compete with weeds. Compared to Yellowbunch, it is earlier and shorter with a slightly blunter tip. Pairs well with Purple Haze and White Satin. Nantes x Imperator type. Also available in organic seed with NOP-compliant pelleting. Avg. 17,000 seeds/lb. Packet: 250 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Deep color, strong tops. Conventional seed with NOP-compliant pelleting.

value: Recommended Summer Planting for Fall Harvest

Yellowstone Pelleted Carrot Seed

Product ID:3333JP.113333JP
Zoom Image

Yellowstone Pelleted Carrot Seed

Product ID:3333JP.113333JP

Yellowstone's 6–8" long roots are deeper in color than most other yellow carrot varieties. Nice, vigorous tops will compete with weeds. Compared to Yellowbunch, it is earlier and shorter with a slightly blunter tip. Pairs well with Purple Haze and White Satin. Nantes x Imperator type. Also available in organic seed with NOP-compliant pelleting. Avg. 17,000 seeds/lb. Packet: 250 seeds.
